title: `package.json` lacks explicit runtime/tooling version pinning
recommendation: Add `engines` and `packageManager` fields in `package.json` to pin supported Node.js and package manager versions, improving environment consistency and long-term maintainability.

title: Potential for code duplication across provider adapters
recommendation: Consider refactoring common logic for response parsing, error handling, or configuration from the individual provider adapters (e.g., gemini.py, claude.py) into a shared base class or utility module. This would reduce code duplication and improve long-term maintainability.

title: 缺少统一的代码风格与静态检查基线

evidence.snippet: 未发现可验证的仓库级格式化/静态检查基线声明（smoke benchmark，无工具模式）

recommendation: 在仓库根目录补充并统一维护代码质量基线（如格式化、lint、类型检查与最小CI门禁），并在贡献文档中明确执行方式，以降低后续维护成本。

title: Inconsistent documentation file naming convention

evidence.snippet: Project contains mixed naming: kebab-case (dry-run-plan.md, implementation-gate-checklist.md) vs snake_case (task_plan.md)

recommendation: Standardize documentation file naming to a single convention (preferably kebab-case) for consistency and easier discovery.
